RawLine: TNPC_60078970,【要得此招，必先懂招。方丈所說的這四句裡，其中「棍影如山」是指……】,【要得此招，必先懂招。方丈所说的这四句里，其中「棍影如山」是指……】

Items.mt: <[>To get this move, you must first understand the move. In the four lines that the abbot said, among them "the shadow of the stick is like a mountain" refers to ...... <]>
